page.title: 09SHOPS
page.content: The shops in Cimla are situated in areas where most people live . There are 2 newsagents which sell sweets, cigarettes, tobacco, soft drinks and newspapers . People use them daily . There are 3 grocers which sell fresh and frozen food, fruit and vegetables, dairy produce and bread.People use these shops because they are so convenient for items forgotten on shopping trips to town.People find these shops much more expensive.They do their main shopping in the large supermarkets in Neath and Swansea. There are 2 post-offices which are used regularly by most people, especially by senior citizens who can collect their pensions there.The only "fish and chip" shop is always busy. A hairdressers has opened recently in the small shopping centre in Castle Drive.
